  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(E item)
      add starter method pre: the item to insert implements the Comparable interface
      Specified by:
      add in interface SearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
      Overrides:
      add in class BinarySearchTree<E extends Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the object is inserted; false if the object already exists in the tree
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if item is not Comparable

    • add

      private AVLTree.AVLNode<E> add​(AVLTree.AVLNode<E> localRoot, E item)
      Recursive add method. Inserts the given object into the tree. post: addReturn is set to true if the item is inserted, false if the item is already in the tree
      Parameters:
      localRoot - The local root of the subtree
      item - The object to be inserted
      Returns:
      The new local root of the subtree with the item inserted

    • rebalanceLeft

      private AVLTree.AVLNode<E> rebalanceLeft​(AVLTree.AVLNode<E> localRoot)
      Method to re-balance left pre: localRoot is the root of an AVL subtree that is critically left-heavy post: balance is restored
      Parameters:
      localRoot - Root of the AVL subtree that needs re-balancing
      Returns:
      a new localRoot

    • rebalanceRight

      private AVLTree.AVLNode<E> rebalanceRight​(AVLTree.AVLNode<E> localRoot)
      Method to re-balance right pre: localRoot is the root of an AVL subtree that is critically right-heavy post: balance is restored
      Parameters:
      localRoot - Root of the AVL subtree that needs re-balancing
      Returns:
      a new localRoot
